entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Red Deer
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:23 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Red Deer Regional Airport 06:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -3.3°C
Pressure: 99.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -5.8°C
Wind: NNE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow mixed with freezing rain. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning then snow at times mixed with freezing rain. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with freezing rain ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
